original_text: Thine ox shall be slain before thine eyes, and thou shalt not eat thereof: thine ass shall be violently taken away from before thy face, and shall not be restored to thee: thy sheep shall be given unto thine enemies, and thou shalt have none to rescue them.
korean_text: 네 소를 네 목전에서 잡았으나 네가 먹지 못할 것이며 네 나귀를 네 목전에서 빼앗겨도 도로 찾지 못할 것이며 네 양을 원수에게 빼앗길 것이나 너를 도와 줄 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Thine ox shall be slain before thine eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 네 소는 네 눈 앞에서 잡히고

sentences.original_text: and thou shalt not eat thereof
thine ass shall be violently taken away
and shall not be restored to thee
thy sheep shall be given unto thine enemies
and thou shalt have none to rescue them
